query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'CIRCLE_MINT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as mint_count,
       SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'CIRCLE_BURN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as burn_count,
       SUM(amount) as total_amount
FROM transactions;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user hMaZ9xp2zKPPmiL.root --database nmnc2rhS5H7jfGAqB8XvCi --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_count, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'CIRCLE_MINT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as mint_count,
       SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'CIRCLE_BURN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as burn_count,
       SUM(amount) as total_amount
FROM transactions;
